title: Can a debt collector put a lien on my home for a debt that was part of a restitution ?
question: Hello, I recently went to refinance my home when the title company discovered two liens. One form the DOJ due to a federal restitution out standing balance and the other from a debt collector. The debt from the debt collector however was already accounted for in my restitution order. If the debt is part of my restitution how can the collector also put a lien on my home.? How can I get the lien removed?
answers: What you need to do is retain an experienced CA Bankruptcy attorney, who will file a Chapter 13 bankruptcy for you. Criminal fines and restitution are NOT dischargable in Bankruptcy. To properly answer your questions and address your concerns, the best way to handle this is with an in person consultation with an experienced CA bankruptcy attorney.
